xccdf:Profile.xccdf:title: CIS Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 Benchmark for Level 2 - Server [CUSTOMIZED]
xccdf:Profile.xccdf:description:
This profile defines a baseline that aligns to the "Level 2 - Server" configuration from the Center for Internet Security® Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 Benchmark™, v2.0.0, released 2024-06-20.
This profile includes Center for Internet Security® Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 CIS Benchmarks™ content.
xccdf:Profile.xccdf:set-value: This is a Singapore Ministry of Defence protected computer system. Unauthorised access, use, reproduction, possession, modification, interception, damage or transfer (including such attempts) of this system or any content therein are serious offices under the Computer Misuse Act. If found guilty, an offender can be fined and/or imprisoned. If you are not authorised to use this system, DO NOT LOG IN OR ATTEMPT TO LOG IN!
